results.title: To build a school house
results.brief_description: Contrasts traditional school building design with modern requirements, showing planning for changes with movable partitions, provision for such needs as language laboratories and visual instruction centres, and ways of adapting existing buildings

results.title: To be a scout
results.brief_description: On his 11th birthday a boy graduates from being a cub to being a boy scout. The various activities of his first year of scouting are shown. These include his first camp, a trip to the Grampians and finally a bicycling camp in Tasmania. The training that scouts receive in disclipine, handicraft and nature study is brought out in the film.
results.description: On his 11th birthday a boy graduates from being a cub to being a boy scout. The various activities of his first year of scouting are shown. results.title: Titanic
results.brief_description: The Titanic carried 2208 passengers, 705 were saved, 1503 died. This film re-constructs the sinking of the boat and the terror of the passengers using drawings and old photographs. The horror of the disaster, the victims, the rescue and the safe arrival of survivors in port is linked by a song.

results.title: Timor: island of fear, island of hope
results.creator_credit: Boubaker Adjala and Timor Defence Foundation
results.brief_description: An historical introduction to East Timor as well as a commentary on contemporary political and military conflicts. Includes film reports from four Australian journalists killed at Balibo in October 1975 and footage of Australian Labor MHR Ken Fry at the United Nations.

results.title: Time for access
results.creator_credit: Deborah Tennet and Wellington Polytechnic Photographic Students Production
results.brief_description: Follows a day in the lives of Michael, a paraplegic and Jane who is visually impaired as they meet to prepare for a concert performance. Shows them engaged in normal everyday activities, rather than focusing on their disabilities.

results.title: Time-lapse footage of decomposing rat

results.title: Space
results.brief_description:
Episode number 3 of Series “The Dance”.
Space is the dancer’s canvas. In this film, animation is used in addition to live action to give a picture of space both inside and outside the dancer’s body.

results.title: Time
results.brief_description:
Episode number 4 of Series “The Dance series”
For the dancer, time is the awareness of duration. The film moves from the traditional musical definition of time into other areas of the time sense.
